original_text: Listen to me! You think that Egypt is strong enough to help you, do you? But you should not trust Pharaoh, the king of Egypt. He is like a weak stick. If you use it to walk with, it will break! A broken piece of stick will make a hole through your hand and give you much pain! That is the trouble that the king of Egypt brings to everyone who trusts him to help them.
korean_text: 이제 네가 너를 위하여 저 상한 갈대 지팡이 애굽을 의뢰하도다 사람이 그것을 의지하면 그의 손에 찔려 들어갈지라 애굽의 왕 바로는 그에게 의뢰하는 모든 자에게 이와 같으니라

sentences.original_text: You think that Egypt is strong enough to help you
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 이집트가 당신을 도울 만큼 강하다고 생각합니다

sentences.original_text: But you should not trust Pharaoh
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 당신은 파라오를 신뢰해서는 안 됩니다

sentences.original_text: He is like a weak stick
If you use it to walk with
A broken piece of stick will make a hole through your hand
sentences.korean_translation: 부러진 지팡이 조각은 당신의 손에 구멍을 낼 것입니다
그리고 당신에게 큰 고통을 줄 것입니다!

sentences.original_text: that the king of Egypt brings to everyone
who trusts him to help them
